title: Script font - need identification
content:
Can someone identify what font this is? Or suggest something similar? Much thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [dotcolon.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122084259/http:/typophile.com/files/dotcolon.png) | 4.96 KB |
author: kawaii_ne

comments.content: Definitely hand-done. Some I like: [CK Cursive](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122084259/http:/www.fontpark.net/en/font/ck-cursive), [After Dark](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122084259/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/blambot/after-dark-bb), [Ahoy Stretched](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122084259/http:/www.eaglefonts.com/ahoy-stretched-ttf-45237.htm), [Scrappers Block](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122084259/http:/www.eaglefonts.com/2peas-scrappers-block-ttf-5118.htm), [CK Love Note](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122084259/http:/www.azfonts.net/load_font/ck_love_note.html), [Plumero](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122084259/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/plumero-script), [Signerica](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122084259/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/signerica), [Business Penmanship](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122084259/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/business-penmanship), [Vermandois](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122084259/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/magpiepaperworks/vermandois)
